text: In our next generation DNA sequencing of the four ticks with Anaplasma we also determined the sequences of the Rickettsia endosymbiont 16S rRNA (GI: KP276589, KP276590 and KP276591), gltA (GI: KP276596, KP276597, KP276598, and KP276599), and rpoB (GI: KP276608, KP276609, KP276610, and KP276611) loci from four ticks. The groEL locus was not sequenced as it was not amplified due to primer design. No sequence variation was detected in the four tick specimens sequenced, and the sequences of the I. pacificus endosymbiont shared 100% identity with the recently published genome sequence. (Fig 1A-1D ).
